messages.subject: Re: Location and Postcard request
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Jill: I live about 15 minutes from the Rhode Island border and could get you a postcard to mail from that state. Let me know if that will do. Olivia
messages.messageBody:
At 03:36 PM 2/17/00 -0500, you wrote:
>
> Is anyone here from Nebraska, New Mexico, Alaska or Rhode Island?



Hi Jill:

I live about 15 minutes from the Rhode Island border and could get you a
postcard to mail from that state. Let me know if that will do.

Olivia

messages.subject: Re: Location and Postcard request
messages.msgSnippet: Is anyone here from Nebraska, New Mexico, Alaska or Rhode Island?  My children are doing state studies and we ve covered those states so far.  I thought it
messages.messageBody:
Is anyone here from Nebraska, New Mexico, Alaska or Rhode Island? My
children are doing state studies and we've covered those states so far. I
thought it would be cool for them to get postcards from those states we have
studied. If you are, or you know someone who is and would be willing to send
a postcard, please let me know and I'll send you our mailing address. Thanks!

Love ya,
Jill
